title: SpeedyStart for Vista
description:
SpeedyStart for Vista 


What does it do? 
SpeedyStart is my latest endeavor which sprouted from a request I read somewhere. It adds self defined, frequently used utilities, tasks, apps or even folders to your Start Button&#039;s context menu. It&#039;s pre-defined entries are there to only to give you a few ideas on what can be easily done with this simply great shell enhancer. Once you become accustomed to it you&#039;ll find yourself quickly missing not having SpeedyStart on a machine without it. 


Full user configurability 


Accessing frequently used items has never been quicker. 


Works with Windows XP & Vista 


SpeedyStart requires no additional processes running in order to work. 

More info here  <a href="
http://S2k-Avenger.forever.as" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://S2k-Avenger.forever.as</a> 

Sorry guys! The first time I put this up the file corrupted.
